page.title: 14TIMSBURY FEMALE FASHIONS(2)
page.content: {THE LATEST FASHIONS. The Teenagers all liked them a lot,and children nearly as much.The adults had mixed feelings about them. {CLOTHES. We found that the adults preferred skirts to trousers or dresses. Teenagers,however,showed a great preference for trousers,whilst the children liked skirts.Dresses seemed to be generally unpopular. {MAKE-UP. The children liked to wear this most of all.This was probably because it is not allowed,usually,unless for dressing up.All groups liked blusher,and mascara was especially popular with adults.Eye-shadow was preferred by the young.Powder was the least popular make-up,but lipstick was the favourite.{(Continued) {By Gaenor,Naomi,Rebecca and Juliette.
